__TOC__

The following machines are responsible for building live filesystems for our desktop CDs:

* amd64: `king`
* hppa: `castilla`
* i386: `terranova`
* ia64: `weddell`
* powerpc: `royal`
* sparc: `vivies`

All of these machines are accessible as `HOSTNAME.buildd` within the Canonical datacentre.

<nowiki>[[http://riva.ucam.org/svn/cjwatson/bin/ubuntu-build-livecd|Script to trigger live filesystem builds (only usable by specific people with authorisation)]]</nowiki>
